for _ in range(int(input())):
 n=int(input())
 a=list(map(int,input().split()))
 b=list(map(int,input().split()))
 a.sort()
 b.sort()
 s=0
 for i in range(n):
  s+=min(a[i],b[i])
 print(s)
for t in range(int(input())):
 n = int(input())
 A = sorted(list(map(int, input().split())))
 B = sorted(list(map(int, input().split())))
 s = 0
 for i in range(n):
  s = s+min(A[i],B[i])
 print(s)
t=int(input())
while t:
 n=int(input())
 a=[int (o) for o in input().split()]
 b=[int (o) for o in input().split()]
 a.sort()
 b.sort()
 s=0
 if a[0]==a[n-1] and b[0]==b[n-1]:
  print(n*min(a[0],b[0]))
 else:
  for i in range(n):
   s+=min(a[i],b[i])
  print(s)
 t-=1

import itertools
t=int(input())
for i in range(t):
 n=int(input())
 a=list(map(int,input().split()))
 a.sort()
 b=list(map(int,input().split()))
 b.sort()
 s=0
 for (f,g) in zip(a,b):
  s+=min(f,g)
 print(s)
# cook your dish here
t=int(input())
for i in range(t):
 c=0
 n=int(input())
 a=[int(j) for j in input().split()]
 b=[int(j) for j in input().split()]
 a.sort()
 b.sort()
 for j in range(len(a)):
  if(a[j]<b[j]):
   c+=a[j]
  else:
   c+=b[j]
 print(c)
for _ in range(int(input())):
 n=int(input())
 a=list(map(int,input().split()))
 b=list(map(int,input().split()))
 a.sort()
 b.sort()
 s=0
 for i,j in zip(a,b):
  s+=min(i,j)
 print(s)
t = int(input())
for i in range(t):
 n = int(input())
 sum = 0
 a = sorted((list(map(int,input().split()))))
 b = sorted((list(map(int,input().split()))))
 for j in range(n):
  if(a[j]<b[j]):
   sum += a[j];
  else:
   sum += b[j];
 print(sum)

for _ in range(t):
 n = int(input())
